mlflex
Class ResultsSaver

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.ResultsSaver

public class ResultsSaver
extends java.lang.Object

This class has functionality to save results from machine-learning analyses. These results are saved in a variety of text files in the Output directory.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo

Method Detail

SaveEnsembleResults

public java.lang.Boolean SaveEnsembleResults(AbstractEnsemblePredictor ensemblePredictor)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
Saves results to output files, depending on the type of analysis it was

Returns:
Indicates whether the save was successful
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

SavePredictionInfoFile

public static void SavePredictionInfoFile(Predictions predictions,
                                          java.lang.String outFilePathPrefix)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
Saves an output file that summarizes predictions that were made. This output file can be used by external applications to analyze the predictions.

Parameters:
predictions - Predictions object
outFilePathPrefix - Text that will prepended to the file names that are saved
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

SavePredictionResults

public java.lang.Boolean SavePredictionResults(ModelSelector modelSelector)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
Saves results to output files, depending on the type of analysis it was

Returns:
Indicates whether the save was successful
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

SaveScalarResults

public static void SaveScalarResults(java.lang.String filePath,
                                     PredictionResults results)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
Saves results to output files for a variety of performance metrics.

Parameters:
filePath - File path where the scalar results will be saved
results - Prediction results
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

SaveScalarResultsSummary

public static java.lang.Boolean SaveScalarResultsSummary()
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
Saves a text file that summarizes all the scalar results for this experiment into a single tab-delimited text file. This file gets saved into the Output directory.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception
